Name: date
Comment: Partition column (YYYY-MM-DD)

Name: hash
Comment: Hash of the transaction

Name: nonce
Comment: The number of transactions made by the sender prior to this one

Name: transaction_index
Comment: Integer of the transactions index position in the block

Name: from_address
Comment: Address of the sender

Name: to_address
Comment: Address of the receiver

Name: value
Comment: Value transferred in wei

Name: gas
Comment: Gas price provided by the sender in wei

Name: gas_price
Comment: Gas provided by the sender

Name: input
Comment: The data sent along with the transaction

Name: receipt_cumulative_gas_used
Comment: The total amount of gas used when this transaction was executed in the block

Name: receipt_gas_used
Comment: The amount of gas used by this specific transaction alone

Name: receipt_contract_address
Comment: The contract address created, if the transaction was a contract creation

Name: receipt_status
Comment: If the transaction was successful

Name: block_timestamp
Comment: The unix timestamp for when the block was collated

Name: block_number
Comment: Block number where this transaction was in

Name: block_hash
Comment: Hash of the block

Name: max_fee_per_gas
Comment: Total fee that covers both base and priority fees

Name: max_priority_fee_per_gas
Comment: Fee given to miners to incentivize them to include the transaction

Name: transaction_type
Comment: Transaction type

Name: receipt_effective_gas_price
Comment: The actual value per gas deducted from the senders account.
